name: Eagle Barista
description:
There is an eagle in a coffee shop trying to make drinks. Use it's talons to pick up objects. Fly to the different machines to brew drinks. Most of the machines have either a button or lever to activate them, just hover the eagle's talons over it and use the left mouse button. This game is entirely unfinished. There is no goal implemented in the game. You are able to make a couple of drinks. That is it.

Controls

  • W, A, S, D - Movement
  • Space - Flap wings
  • Left Mouse - Pick up object
  • Right Mouse - Drop object

Controller is also supported.

If for whatever reason you want the unity project;

https://github.com/Chopknee/EagleBarista

I may continue working on this when more time is available.
